user_query: I want to plan a vacation to a tropical destination. Can you suggest some cities with beautiful beaches and warm weather? Also, provide me with the geolocation details and time zone information for those cities.

TaskList.description: Research and list tropical destinations known for their beautiful beaches and warm weather.
Gather geolocation details (latitude and longitude) for the cities identified in subtask 1.
Obtain time zone information for the cities identified in subtask 1.
